name: Adam Rasmussen
text: Ordered from this location for years (and dealt with the occasional mistakes and cold pizza) because we moderately enjoy papa johns and we did not like any of the competitors.  NOW all of a sudden they wont deliver to our area any more.  I …More

name: Eric
text: If you want your pizza warm, cut, and in a timely manner, don’t order from here. I’ve given them two tries and both times my pizza has taken an unreasonable amount of time. (99-120 minutes). One time I put it in as a future order and it was still late...

name: Christopher Anderson
text: Closed temporarily according to a sign on the Aurora location, but no signage here. Also, no start date on the sign left on the Aurora location, so it's hard to tell when it will be open again. I tried calling the number, and I got the "number has been disconnected" message. Not good enough.

name: Vaibhav Parikh
text: Garlic bread sticks were good. Pizza was ok.

name: Candice Truett
text: This store does not want to keep it's customers.  I have been ordering for over a year and last week the female assistant manager tells me she doesn't want to deliver to me anymore.  Great customer service.

name: Georgie Cruz
text: Ive been buying pizza from this store for months and all the time the food is great and never had no complaints. Fresh fast delivery!!!

name: Kulvis Flabu
text: Me love pizza!  Delivery drivers are so cool!  The pizza makes me happy too!  Id have to say the driver who is the big tall white dude is the coolest and best god of pizza.

name: IZIK MICHA
text: Bad service.Ordered pizza with onions and buffalo wings with blue cheese.Paid extra for onions.No onions no blue cheese. MANAGER SAYS HE IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ORDERS.

name: Rudy Rigg
text: Papa Johns pizza says open on google search but the number is still disconnected and yesterday it says temporary closed but today it says open but it’s really not open why.

name: Andrea Flores
text: I always wait much longer than it says online. The last time I ordered I used the track my pizza feature on the website. It said that it was on it's way and it took over an hour to drive to my house which would usually be only a 10 minute …More

name: Lulu Alya
text: We ordered pizza at 530, mind you we live about 10 min away if not less, 645 we call and ask what's going on since we didn't get it yet and we were told 45 min, we were told it would be there in five minutes. A quarter to 8 we call back to …More

name: Max Wilson
text: One star is too generous of a rating. Through a series of inexcusable mistakes, this Papa John’s location single-handedly ruined the only 3 hours I got to spent with my family in the last 2 months. First, they incorrectly put my order in as …More

name: KSHITEESH SHUKLA
text: Good customer service.

name: Joe Corvaia
text: Excellent pizza , it was tasty and warm .

name: Ryan Braun
text: Pick up order. Waited in store for 45 min. while I was waiting, I saw the guy making pizza with no gloves and rubbing his nose and putting hand in his pocket. Disgusting! And asked for extra garlic sauce and they ha they had audacity to charge me. Owners need to come in the store some night and see how it is being run.

name: Muhammad Zaidi
text:
Give pepperoni instead of cheese
I mean who does that

name: Lauren Bezdek
text: Waited more than 3x the time stated for delivery. Even with a coupon for future order that is unacceptable. When I called the store they promised after waiting far past quoted time that it would be here within a range- still, not here. …More

name: Todd Stocke
text: If you order online for pickup yourself, you're safe. If you want to call it in for delivery, good luck to you.

name: Durga Chilukuri
text: Last night ordered a chicken pizza and it was so awful, there was no tomato sauce, just bland with very few toppings even though i  ordered 5. Moreover,  it wasn't baked perfectly, the dough was raw in places. So bad, i'll never order here again and i dont recommend at all.

name: Alton Kusch
text: The last 3 times I have ordered, it's taken well over an hour to get my pizza. The last time I called and gave instructions to call my cell on arrival, they never called and when I tried to check on the status, they were rude and said I …More

name: Dante Yager
text: First of all my daughter order some pizza for herabd some friends over the phone and had to wait over 10 mins just to get the order started, secondly they are playing music far to loud cause i was given the phone and i couldn't even hear …More

name: Kelly Kuckelman
text: Ordered recently from this store and our order was delivered incorrect. Called and told them off the mistake and we recieved a credit of the missed item.  Just ordered from them again...got the missed item free and had our food delivered on a Saturday during the 7 o'clock hour within 15mins! Thanks Papa Johns! This store is great!

name: Peter Lasky
text: No dine in so only 4 stars, but the pizzas are made very quickly and are relatively cheap.

name: Hari P
text: We love the place and the staff. All the time they are on time

name: J. Andrew Elliott
text: The pizza is great. The staff was courteous despite delays.

name: Beck Kuchkarov
text: good place to get a pizza, they pretty much do good job all the time

name: Sameer Mustafa
text: Customer service and order accuracy are much much better. Will return again.

name: Prashant
text: I like the pizza but the quality feels like it's not going up.

name: Dave Taylor
text: Always good

name: Marvin Wayne Brunson
text: Ok

name: John Garrett
text: Way overpriced

name: raj k
text: Worst service and irresponsible manager. I didn't get my pizza delivered even after 1 1/2 hr and when i called the manager said it will take 20-30 more minutes. The manager was very rude and not even cared about the late delivery

name: Campbell LW
text: Usually good

name: Jagz G
text: Pizza was cooked well

name: A Martinez
text: Good service!

name: Gigin Krishnan
text: fine

name: princessspam baker
text: Way to priciy

name: huang junjun
text: delivery about about an hour, my address only 5 minutes from this store.

name: ben dismer
text: This location is horrible.

name: Sharlës Johnson
text: Rude had order wrong. They got mad and as we sit waiting can hear them talking and say "so over this job". Then not knowing we are hear listening. They all need to get fired.

name: Tristan Tran
text: Deliveries always take over 45 minutes no exceptions, sometimes arriving cold so I have to microwave it.

name: raghav nallan
text: they probably make the worst pizza. waste of money

name: Ollie Wild
text: I like Papa John's pizza, but this particular location is the pits! My last order was 45 minutes late. I cancelled the order before that after waiting 1 1/2 hours, calling them twice, and still getting no satisfactory response about when my pizza would arrive. I will not be ordering from here again anytime soon.
